subject: Re: [junit] good examples of junit usage
msgSnippet: Eclipse (www.eclipse.org) has *loads* of unit tests through junit. To get ahold of the tests, you have to go to the CVS repository, as they are not released as
messageBody:
Eclipse (www.eclipse.org) has *loads* of unit tests through junit. To get
ahold of the tests, you have to go to the CVS repository, as they are not
released as part of the regular code drop.

bab

Brian Button bbutton@...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Amir Michail" <amichail@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 27, 2002 7:36 PM
Subject: [junit] good examples of junit usage


> Hi,
>
> I would like to do some research on applications that make use
> of junit. Ideally, such applications would be non-trivial yet
> understandable by someone not familiar with the domain. Moreover,
> the application should have lots of test cases with meaningful names that
> exercise much of the functionality of that application.
>
> Any recommendations? Applications written in Python would be good also
> though I suspect there are a lot more written in Java.
